body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer support. My name is Sean Ramirez and I work for SafeRide Car Dealership. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Christine Foster.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Christine. To assist you better, could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five two three four one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Christine. And could you also confirm your email address with us?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is c dot foster at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information with us, Christine. We will look into the security issue you reported.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Christine. If you have any more questions, please don't hesitate to contact us. Thank you for your time. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Christine. Have a great day!
